golden_diagnosis: 尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,Niemann-pick disease, type C2,尼曼匹克病A型/Niemann-Pick disease type A; NPD-A/Niemann-Pick disease, type A,尼曼匹克病A型/Niemann-Pick disease type A; NPD-A/Niemann-Pick disease, type A
predict_diagnosis:
1. Eisenmenger's syndrome with associated liver involvement and hematologic abnormalities.
2. Hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH) with multiorgan dysfunction, including cardiomyopathy and liver disease.
3. Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) with systemic complications such as heart and liver involvement.
4. Mucopolysaccharidosis (MPS) with cardiopulmonary and hepatosplenomegaly features.
5. Primary biliary cholangitis with associated portal hypertension, splenomegaly, and secondary heart complications.
6. Storage disorder (e.g., Gaucher's disease) with bone, liver, and splenic involvement, leading to systemic manifestations.
7. Endocarditis with valvular destruction, congestive heart failure, and systemic embolization, including liver and spleen.
8. Autoimmune lymphoproliferative syndrome (ALPS) with multiorgan involvement, including hematologic, hepatic, and cardiac abnormalities.
9. Hepatic veno-occlusive disease (VOD) with associated sinusoidal obstruction syndrome (SOS), leading to hepatosplenomegaly and systemic symptoms.
10. Metabolic cardiomypathy (e.g., glycogen storage disease type II) with hepatic and cardiac manifestations, including valvular and ventricular dysfunction.
